text: Atahpara sayatana ubhayake prarocita karala, yate tadera anga, ya tadera kache gopana chila, tadera samane prakasa kare deya. Se balalah tomadera palanakarta tomaderake e brksa theke nisedha karenani; tabe ta e karane ye, tomara na abara pheresata haye ya'o-kimba haye ya'o cirakala basabasakari.
